ai-ja264:1.1_0: There was a king named Panāda
ai-ja264:1.2_0: who had a sacrificial post all golden.
ai-ja264:1.3_0: Its height was sixteen times its width,
ai-ja264:1.4_0: like a trick in a banner,
ai-ja264:2.1_0: It had a thousand panels and a hundred ball-caps,
ai-ja264:2.2_0: all adorned with banners, and made of gold.
ai-ja264:3.3_0: I was Sakka, lord of gods,
ai-ja264:4.1_0: and the fourth (direction) arose out of the boy.
